summary.span: 封裝 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式。

span.span: Encapsulates a Windows Presentation Foundation application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是類別，將封裝[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式專屬功能，包括下列： is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **應用程式存留期**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Application Lifetime**: , , , , , , , , , . - **應用程式範圍 視窗、 屬性和資源管理**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: , , , , , , , , . - **命令列參數並結束程式碼處理**: ， ， 。**Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: , , . - **瀏覽**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Navigation**: , , , , , , , , . 實作單一模式，以提供其視窗、 屬性和資源範圍服務的共用的存取。 implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services. 因此，只有一個執行個體類別可由每個。Consequently, only one instance of the class can be created per . 您可以實作使用標記、 標記和程式碼後置或程式碼。You can implement an using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 如果是否標記檔案標記或標記和程式碼後置，必須設定為要使用的標記，實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)]`ApplicationDefinition`項目。If is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item. > [!NOTE] > 獨立應用程式不需要物件; 它也可以實作自訂`static`進入點方法 (`Main`)，而不需要建立的執行個體開啟的視窗。A standalone application does not require an object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of . 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]需要物件。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] require an object. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在標準的應用程式定義只使用標記：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppMarkup.xaml#applicationmarkup)] 下列範例會示範如何使用定義的標準應用程式僅程式碼：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppCode.cs#applicationcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/appcode.vb#applicationcode)] 下列範例會示範如何在標準的應用程式標記和程式碼後置的組合來定義。The following example shows how a standard application is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#applicationxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#applicationcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#applicationcodebehind)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個執行個體類別可由每個，以確保單一資料集的應用程式範圍 視窗、 屬性和資源的共用的存取。Only one instance of the class can be created per , to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data. 因此，預設的建構函式類別會偵測是否已初始化的執行個體中的第一個執行個體; 如果不是，就會擲回。Consequently, the default constructor of the class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an ; if it is not, an is thrown. 物件目前公開靜態屬性。The object for the current is exposed from the static property.

summary.span: 當應用程式變成前景應用程式時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有一或多個開啟的視窗，Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式會啟動 （變成前景應用程式） 當其中一個 windows 啟動時第一次啟動應用程式，因為或其中一個視窗在何時啟用時應用程式為非使用中： 特別是，啟用，就會發生時：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - 應用程式開啟其第一個視窗。An application opens its first window. - 使用 ALT + TAB，或使用 工作管理員，使用者會切換至應用程式。A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 使用者按一下其中一個應用程式視窗的工作列按鈕。A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application. 需要偵測當他們所啟動的應用程式能夠處理事件。Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the event. 第一次啟動應用程式之後，它可能會停用並重新啟動幾次在其存留期間。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果應用程式的狀態或行為取決於其啟動狀態，它可以處理兩者和的事件，以判斷哪一個啟用狀態，它。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which activation state it's in. 一旦應用程式變成使用中將不會再次引發直到應用程式停用時，不論是在應用程式使用中時，會啟動多少 windows 應用程式中的。Once an application becomes active, will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active. 不會引發[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何偵測何時的獨立應用程式啟用和停用。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application activates and deactivates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為每個-單一型別可實作靜態屬性提供的共用的存取目前的執行個體。 is a per- singleton type that implements the static property to provide shared access to the instance for the current . 此設計會保證受該狀態包括共用的資源和狀態，而且可從單一的共用位置。This design guarantees that state managed by , including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location. 這個屬性是安全執行緒，可從任何執行緒。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.

summary.span: 當應用程式不再做為前景應用程式時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式具有一個或多個開啟的視窗就會停用 （停止前景應用程式） 時使用者會執行下列：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - 切換至另一個應用程式使用 ALT + TAB，或使用 工作管理員。Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 按一下另一個應用程式視窗的工作列按鈕。Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application. 需要偵測停用作業可以處理的應用程式事件。Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the event. 第一次啟動應用程式之後，它可能會停用並重新啟動幾次在其存留期間。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果應用程式的狀態或行為取決於其啟動狀態，它可以處理兩者和的事件，以判斷其狀態它。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which state it's in. 不會引發[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何偵測時就會停用，並啟動獨立應用程式。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application deactivates and activates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DispatcherUnhandledException As DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 當應用程式擲回例外狀況但未處理時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，Windows Presentation Foundation 攔截未處理例外狀況，通知使用者 （從中它們可以回報該例外狀況） 對話方塊中，從例外狀況，自動關閉應用程式。By default, Windows Presentation Foundation catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application. 不過，如果必須執行自訂的未處理例外狀況處理，從一個集中位置的應用程式，您應該處理。However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle . 就會引發的每個主要 UI 執行緒上執行的程式碼未處理的例外狀況。 is raised by an for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread. 如果未處理例外狀況在 UI 執行緒背景 (使用它自己的執行緒) 或背景工作執行緒 (不含執行緒)，例外狀況不會轉送至主要 UI 執行緒。If an exception is not handled on either a background UI thread (a thread with its own ) or a background worker thread (a thread without a ), the exception is not forwarded to the main UI thread. 因此，就不會引發。Consequently, is not raised. 在這些情況下，您必須撰寫程式碼來執行下列作業：In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1. 處理背景執行緒上的例外狀況。Handle exceptions on the background thread. 2. 分派的主要 UI 執行緒的例外狀況。Dispatch those exceptions to the main UI thread. 3. 重新擲回它們的主要 UI 執行緒上而不處理它們允許引發。Rethrow them on the main UI thread without handling them to allow to be raised. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒模型](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model.md)概觀。For more information, see the [Threading Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model.md) overview. 傳遞事件處理常式引數，其中包含有關例外狀況，內容資訊包括：The event handler is passed a argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - 例外狀況 ()。The exception (). - 從起源自 ()。The from which it originated (). 您可以使用這項資訊來判斷例外狀況是否為可復原。You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not. 可復原的例外狀況可能是，例如，時間可能會無法復原的例外狀況，例如。A recoverable exception might be a , for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a , for example. 當您處理來自未處理的例外狀況，而且您不想[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]繼續處理它，您需要設定屬性`true`。When you process an unhandled exception from , and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the property to `true`. 不同於其他事件，引發，不具有相對應的受保護虛擬實作 (OnDispatcherUnhandledException)。Unlike the other events that raises, does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException). 因此，類別衍生自一律必須註冊事件處理常式和處理未處理例外狀況。Consequently, classes that derive from must always register an event handler with to process unhandled exceptions. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理未處理例外狀況處理事件。The following example shows how to process unhandled exceptions by handling the event. [!code-csharp[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind1)] [!code-vb[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind2)] [!code-vb[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Exit As ExitEventHandler

summary.span: 只在應用程式關閉之前發生，且無法取消。

span.span: Occurs just before an application shuts down, and cannot be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以關機的原因如下：An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - 方法物件就會呼叫，以明確或決定屬性。The method of the object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the property. - 使用者透過登出或關機，結束工作階段。The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down. 處理應用程式關閉時，您可以偵測事件，並執行任何所需的額外處理。You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the event, and perform any additional processing as required. 您也可以處理來檢查或變更應用程式結束代碼，當您不需要呼叫明確。You can also handle to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call explicitly. 結束代碼從公開屬性引數傳遞至事件處理常式。The exit code is exposed from the property of the argument that's passed to the event handler. 當應用程式停止執行時，結束代碼會傳遞給作業系統，供後續處理。When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing. 如果您的應用程式處理事件，並接著取消，就不會引發和應用程式繼續執行的像素來關機模式。If your application handles the event and subsequently cancels it, is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode. 可設定結束碼[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，但是會忽略這個值。The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored. 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]，引發下列情況：For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], is raised in the following circumstances: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]巡覽離開的。An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is navigated away from. - 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]，當 [] 索引標籤裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]已關閉。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is closed. - 關閉瀏覽器時。When the browser is closed. 在所有情況下，值屬性會被忽略。In all cases, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何：The following example demonstrates how to: - 處理事件。Handle the event. - 檢查並更新屬性。Inspect and update the property of the . - 隔離儲存區中的應用程式記錄檔中寫入項目。Write an entry to an application log in isolated storage. - 持續隔離儲存區的應用程式狀態。Persist the application state to isolated storage. [!code-xaml[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handleexitxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handleexitcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handleexitcodebehind)]

span.span: The name of the resource to find.

summary.span: 使用指定的索引鍵搜尋[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 資源，例如 或 ，如果找不到要求的資源，則擲回例外狀況 (請參閱 [XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md))。

span.span: Searches for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] resource, such as a or , with the specified key, and throws an exception if the requested resource is not found (see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)).
The requested resource object.

returns.span: 如果找不到要求的資源，則會擲回 。

span.span: If the requested resource is not found, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會先尋找在指定的資源的應用程式範圍資源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 應用程式範圍的資源由管理，而且會公開從屬性。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果應用程式範圍資源集中找不到指定的資源然後搜尋系統資源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系統資源是由使用者定義的 shell 資源，並且包含色彩、 字型及殼層組態。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 這些由公開， ，和類型，分別靜態屬性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 若要使用取得它們，這些型別也會公開資源的索引鍵屬性是設計成傳遞給; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 因為傳回的物件，如果找到資源，您必須轉換成適當的類型傳回的值。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您找不到索引鍵呼叫這個方法，會擲回例外狀況。If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況所導致的呼叫，呼叫在內。傳回`null`時找不到要求的資源，並不會擲回例外狀況參考。If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling , call instead; returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception. 這個方法是安全執行緒，可以從任何執行緒呼叫。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用尋找資源，並處理如果找不到資源。The following example shows how to use to find a resource, and to handle if the resource is not found. [!code-csharp[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)]

exception.span: 找不到資源。

span.span: The resource cannot be found.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Window ^ MainWindow { System::Windows::Window ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Window ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的主視窗。

span.span: Gets or sets the main window of the application.

value.span: 指定做為主應用程式視窗的 。

span.span: A that is designated as the main application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會自動設定的第一個參考物件具現化中。 is automatically set with a reference to the first object to be instantiated in the . 您可以設定來指定不同的主視窗指派另一個物件屬性。You can specify a different main window by setting assigning another object to the property. 如果屬性物件設定為，關閉主視窗會關閉應用程式。If the property of the object is set to , closing the main window causes the application to shut down. 您可設定屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]，如果應用程式的主視窗不是由設定視窗屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。It is possible to set the property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 兩個限制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]方法是：The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - 您可以指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-只或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-只做為主要的視窗。You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only as the main window. - 您必須設定您所指定視窗的屬性，否則它將不會顯示。You must set the property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown. 第一個參考要具現化物件也會加入做為第一個項目集合。The reference to the first object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the collection. 如果後續將不同的參考，將會變更主視窗的參考之項目的位置，在順序中的項目時維持不變。If is subsequently set with a reference to a different , the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in remains the same. 因此，一律使用主視窗而不是中的第一個項目參考。Consequently, always use to refer to the main window instead of the first item in . > [!NOTE] > 如果主視窗已，和您需要特定存取成員，您將需要的值轉換至。If the main window is a , and you need specific access to members, you will need to cast the value of to . > > 這個屬性就只能從建立的執行緒物件。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何尋找主應用程式視窗。The following example shows how to find the main application window. [!code-csharp[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] 下列範例示範如何設定使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#SetApplicationMainWindowXAML](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/XAML/App.xaml#setapplicationmainwindowxaml)] 下列範例示範如何具現化應用程式啟動期間的程式碼中。The following example shows how to instantiate the in code during application startup. [!code-csharp[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)] [!code-vb[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)]

summary.span: 取得應用程式範圍的屬性集合。

An that contains the application-scope properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會公開透過字典可用來儲存應用程式範圍的屬性。 exposes a dictionary via which you can use to store application-scope properties. 這可讓您共用中的所有程式碼之間的狀態以執行緒安全的方式，而不必自行撰寫程式的狀態碼。This allows you to share state amongst all code in an in a thread-safe fashion, without the need to write your own state code. 屬性儲存在必須轉換成傳回適當的型別。Properties stored in must be converted to the appropriate type returned. 屬性是安全執行緒，可從任何執行緒。The property is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立並使用應用程式領域屬性使用。The following example shows how create and use an application-scope property using . [!code-xaml[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#HandleStartupXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlestartupxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#MainWindowGetPropertyXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#mainwindowgetpropertyxaml1)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#MainWindowGetPropertyXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#mainwindowgetpropertyxaml2)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#MainWindowGetPropertyCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowgetpropertycodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationPropertiesSnippets#MainWindowGetPropertyCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationPropertiesSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowgetpropertycodebehind)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，提供 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 應用程式中資源的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 套件。

span.span: Gets or sets the that provides the pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for resources in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.

value.span: 的參考，提供 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] 應用程式中資源的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 套件。

span.span: A reference to the that provides the pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for resources in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]相對於項目組件，從傳回的值由執行階段在解決資源方法。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] resources are resolved at run time with respect to the entry assembly, which is identified by the value returned from the method. 項目組件是所傳回的組件，而且可以是下列：The entry assembly is the assembly that is returned by and could be the following: - 預設應用程式定義域中的可執行組件。The executable assembly in the default application domain. - 要執行之呼叫的第一個組件。The first assembly to be executed by calling . 在下列情況中，不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]組件無法取得項目組件的參考：In the following cases, however, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly cannot get a reference to the entry assembly: - Unmanaged （機器碼） 的應用程式主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]組件。An unmanaged (native) application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly. - 受管理的應用程式主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]組件載入至新的應用程式定義域以外使用方法。A managed application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly by loading it into a new application domain using a method other than . 在上述兩種情況，傳回`null`，而[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]無法解析組件的資源。In both of these cases, returns `null`, and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly's resources cannot be resolved. 在這些情況下，可以可設定，一次只應該用來解析資源的組件的參考。In these cases, can be set, once only, with a reference to the assembly that should be used to resolve resources. 只能設定一次，所以不太可能，資源組件會在之後變更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]已載入組件。 can only be set once because it is unlikely that the resource assembly will change after the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly is loaded. > [!NOTE] > 時不能設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]組件可以探索項目組件 — 也就是，當傳回組件的參考而非`null`。 cannot be set when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly can discover the entry assembly—that is, when returns a reference to an assembly rather than `null`. 這個屬性是安全執行緒，可從任何執行緒。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application has an entry assembly, or has already been set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::ResourceDictionary ^ Resources { System::Windows::ResourceDictionary ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::ResourceDictionary ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式範圍的資源集合，例如樣式和筆刷。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of application-scope resources, such as styles and brushes.

value.span: 物件，包含零個以上的應用程式範圍資源。

span.span: A object that contains zero or more application-scope resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來在 windows 和應用程式的項目之間共用資源。The property can be used to share resources across the windows and elements of an application. 此外，屬性包含在資源查閱路徑、 周遊順序如下：Additionally, the property is included in the resource lookup path, which is traversed in the following order: 1. 項目Elements 2. WindowsWindows 3. 4. 系統System 因此，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素可以繫結至應用程式範圍的資源。Consequently, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements can bind to application-scope resources. 此外，如果變更資源，資源系統可確保該元素繫結至這些資源的屬性會自動更新以反映變更。Additionally, if resources change, the resource system ensures that element properties which are bound to those resources are automatically updated to reflect the change. 應用程式範圍的資源會提供簡單的方式，以支援跨應用程式一致的主題。Application-scope resources provide a simple way to support a consistent theme across your application. 您可以輕鬆地建立佈景主題[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]使用`Application.Resources`標記。You can easily create a theme in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] by using the `Application.Resources` tag. 不過，如果您的應用程式支援多個主題，其中可能包含大量的佈景主題的項目，可能是您更輕鬆地管理這些使用其中一種為每個主題的執行個體。However, if your application supports multiple themes, which may contain a large number of theme elements, it might be easier to manage them using one instance for each theme. 如此一來，可以套用新的佈景主題的資源屬性設定為適當。In this way, a new theme can be applied by setting the Resources property to the appropriate . 有兩個使用時的考量。There are two considerations to make when using . 首先，字典*金鑰*不是物件，因此您必須使用完全相同物件執行個體時設定和取得屬性值 （請注意使用字串時，索引鍵是區分大小寫）。First, the dictionary *key* is an object, so you need to use exactly the same object instance when both setting and getting a property value (note that the key is case-sensitive when using a string). 其次，字典*值*不是物件，因此您必須取得的屬性值時，就將值轉換成所需的類型。Second, the dictionary *value* is an object, so you will need to convert the value to the desired type when getting a property value. 具備執行緒安全，可從任何執行緒。 is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]連同應用程式範圍的資源，以建立一致的視覺外觀。This example illustrates how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] together with application-scope resources to create a consistent visual appearance. [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#ResourcesPropertyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/App.xaml#resourcespropertyxaml)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#WindowBackgroundPropertyXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#windowbackgroundpropertyxaml1)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#WindowBackgroundPropertyXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#windowbackgroundpropertyxaml2)] 下列範例會示範如何在程式碼和 XAML 的應用程式資源。The following example shows how to set an application resource in code and XAML. [!code-csharp[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-xaml[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#setapplicationscoperesourcexaml)] 下列範例會示範如何在程式碼中取得應用程式的資源。The following example shows how to get an application resource in code. [!code-csharp[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫以啟動[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]應用程式。 is called to start a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application. 如果您定義您使用標記或標記和程式碼後置會隱含地呼叫。If you define your using markup, or markup and code-behind, will be called implicitly. 不過，如果您定義您使用程式碼，您需要明確地呼叫。However, if you define your using code, you will need to explicitly call . 當呼叫時，附加新UI 執行緒的執行個體。When is called, attaches a new instance to the UI thread. 下一步物件的呼叫方法，以便啟動訊息幫浦來處理 windows 訊息。Next, the object's method is called, which starts a message pump to process windows messages. 最後，物件會呼叫物件的方法，以引發事件。Finally, the object calls the object's the method to raise the event. 因此，您所處理的時間建立應用程式執行模型，此時應用程式會被視為在執行。Consequently, the application execution model has been established by the time you handle , at which point the application is considered to be running. 應用程式停止時執行稱為; 的值屬性會決定何時呼叫時，與是否自動，或者您需要明確地呼叫它。An application stops running when is called; the value of the property determines when is called, and whether it happens automatically or you need to explicitly call it. 可以只從建立的執行緒呼叫物件。 can be called only from the thread that creates the object. 此外，無法從呼叫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Also, cannot be called from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用自訂的應用程式，因此必須明確地呼叫。The following example shows an application that uses a custom and must therefore explicitly call . [!code-csharp[ApplicationRunSnippets#CustomEntryPointAndRunCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationRunSnippets/CSharp/App.cs#customentrypointandruncode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationRunSnippets#CustomEntryPointAndRunCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationRunSnippets/visualbasic/app.vb#customentrypointandruncode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載擴充方法來執行的應用程式啟動後開啟指定的視窗。This overload extends the method to open the specified window after an application starts running. 如果您的程式碼定義，會開啟視窗，它會開始執行時，明確地呼叫。If you define a code that opens a window when it starts running, you explicitly call . 如果您建立您使用標記或標記和程式碼後置，您就可以自動開啟視窗期間使用的下列技術：If you create your using markup, or markup and code-behind, you can automatically open a window during using either of the following techniques: - 以宣告方式，是藉由設定。Declaratively, by setting . - 以程式設計的方式，藉由處理。Programmatically, by handling . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示應用程式具現化的手動建立靜態進入點方法，然後再呼叫。The following example shows an application with a manually-created static entry point method that instantiates , before calling . summary.span: 當使用者登出或關閉作業系統而結束 Windows 工作階段時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user ends the Windows session by logging off or shutting down the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，應用程式關閉時 Windows 工作階段隨即結束，使用者登出或關閉時，就會發生。By default, an application shuts down when the Windows session ends, which occurs when a user logs off or shuts down. 當發生這種情況時，Windows 會要求每個開啟的應用程式關閉。When this happens, Windows asks each open application to shut down. 不過，它可能會，應用程式可能無法馬上發生此情況時關閉。However, it is possible that an application may not be ready to shut down when this occurs. 例如，應用程式可能處於不一致的狀態，或進行長時間執行的作業資料。For example, an application may have data that is in an inconsistent state, or in the middle of a long-running operation. 在這些情況下，它可能會想要防止結束，工作階段，並可能比較想要允許使用者決定要讓結束工作階段的選項。In these situations, it may be desirable to prevent the session from ending, and may be more desirable to allow users the option to decide whether or not to let the session to end. 您可以藉由處理的工作階段結束時偵測到事件。You can detect when a session ends by handling the event. 如果應用程式需要阻礙工作階段結束，傳遞至事件處理常式的引數會公開，您將設定為`true`(預設值是`false`)。If an application needs to prevent the session from ending, the argument that is passed to the event handler exposes the that you set to `true` (the default value is `false`). 如果未經處理，或處理而被取消，稱為和就會引發事件。If is unhandled, or is handled without being cancelled, is called and the event is raised. 若要取得工作階段結束的原因的詳細資訊，請檢查應用程式可以，這是其中一個值 (和)。To obtain more information about why the session is ending, an application can inspect , which is one of the values ( and ). 不是主控台應用程式所引發。 is not raised by console applications. 只能在建立的執行緒上引發物件。 is raised only on the thread that creates the object. 不會引發 XAML 瀏覽器應用程式 (Xbap)。 is not raised for XAML browser applications (XBAPs). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理事件，並允許使用者取消它。The following example demonstrates how to handle the event and allow the user to cancel it. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlingsessionendingxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是任意的資料片段都儲存在應用程式工作階段 (工作階段 cookie)，或在應用程式工作階段 (持續性 cookies) 之間的用戶端電腦上應用程式。A cookie is an arbitrary piece of data that can be stored by an application on the client machine during application sessions (session cookies) or across application sessions (persistent cookies). 您可以藉由呼叫來建立這兩種類型的 cookie 。You can create both types of cookies by calling . Cookie 資料通常會以下列格式的名稱/值組的格式：Cookie data typically takes the form of a name/value pair in the following format: `Name=Value` 您傳遞至這個格式的字串，連同設定 cookie 的位置 （一般而言，應用程式定義域）。You pass a string of this format to , along with the of the location for which the cookie should be set (typically, the application domain). 您是否 cookie 是工作階段 cookie 或永續性 cookie，取決於是否 cookie 字串傳遞給包含到期日。Whether a cookie is a session cookie or a persistent cookie depends on whether the cookie string that you pass to includes an expiry date. 工作階段 cookie 字串沒有包括到期日。The string for a session cookie does not include an expiry date. 永續性 cookie 字串存在，而且必須以下列格式：The string for a persistent cookie does, and must be in the following format: `NAME=VALUE; expires=DAY, DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS GMT` 永續性 cookie 儲存在目前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]安裝的 Temporary Internet Files 資料夾，直至到期，在此情況下會刪除它們為止。Persistent cookies are stored in the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] installation's Temporary Internet Files folder until they expire, in which case they are deleted. 您可以從您的應用程式刪除永續性 cookie，藉由其到期日設定在過去的日期/時間值。You can delete a persistent cookie from your application by setting its expiry date to a date/time value that is in the past. 如概觀中的 cookie [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]，請參閱[巡覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md).

summary.span: 關閉應用程式。

span.span: Shuts down an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫時，應用程式停止執行。When is called, an application stops running. 您可以處理事件來偵測應用程式時即將停止執行，若要執行任何適當的處理。You can handle the event to detect when an application is about to stop running, to perform any appropriate processing. 會隱含地呼叫 Windows Presentation Foundation 在下列情況： is implicitly called by Windows Presentation Foundation in the following situations: - 當設。When is set to . - 當設。When the is set to . - 當使用者結束工作階段和事件已處理時，或處理，而取消。When a user ends a session and the event is either unhandled, or handled without cancellation. 呼叫明確會導致應用程式關閉，不論設定。Calling explicitly causes an application to shut down, regardless of the setting. 不過，如果設，您必須呼叫關閉應用程式。However, if is set to , you must call to shut down an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當是呼叫，應用程式將會關閉無論是否取消事件的任何開啟的視窗。When is called, the application will shut down irrespective of whether the event of any open windows is canceled. 可以呼叫這個方法，只能從建立的執行緒物件。This method can be called only from the thread that created the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式停止執行時，才呼叫應用程式的方法。Applications stop running only when the method of the Application is called. 隱含或明確地為指定的值，可能會發生關機屬性。Shut down can occur implicitly or explicitly, as specified by the value of the property. 如果您設定至，Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 會隱含呼叫應用程式中的上一個視窗關閉時，即使未設定任何目前的具現化的視窗做為主要視窗 (請參閱)。If you set to , Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) implicitly calls when the last window in an application closes, even if any currently instantiated windows are set as the main window (see ). A的會隱含地呼叫 WPF時隨即關閉，即使目前開啟其他視窗。A of causes WPF to implicitly call when the closes, even if other windows are currently open. 某些應用程式的存留期間可能不相依於當主視窗或最後一個視窗已關閉，或可能完全不能相依於 windows。The lifetime of some applications may not be dependent on when the main window or last window is closed, or may not be dependent on windows at all. 這些案例，您需要設定屬性，這需要明確停止應用程式的方法呼叫。For these scenarios you need to set the property to , which requires an explicit method call to stop the application. 否則，應用程式會繼續在背景執行。Otherwise, the application continues running in the background. 可以從以宣告方式設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]或以程式設計方式從程式碼。 can be configured declaratively from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] or programmatically from code. 這個屬性就只能從建立的執行緒物件。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定來指定應用程式必須明確地關閉。The following example shows how to configure to specify that an application must be closed explicitly. [!code-xaml[ApplicationShutdownModeSnippets#SetShutdownModeXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationShutdownModeSnippets/CS/App.xaml#setshutdownmodexaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Startup As StartupEventHandler

summary.span: 呼叫 物件的 方法時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the method of the object is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在啟動時，包括一般的 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式可能會執行各種不同的初始設定工作：A typical Windows Presentation Foundation application may perform a variety of initialization tasks when it starts up, including: - 處理命令列參數。Processing command-line parameters. - 開啟主視窗。Opening the main window. - 正在初始化應用程式範圍的資源。Initializing application-scope resources. - 正在初始化應用程式範圍的屬性。Initializing application-scope properties. 您可以以宣告方式指定的主視窗和使用的應用程式範圍資源[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)](和分別)。You can declaratively specify the main window and application-scope resources using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] ( and , respectively). 有時候，不過，資源或主視窗的應用程式只能判斷以程式設計方式在執行階段。Sometimes, however, the resources or main window of your application can only be determined programmatically at run time. 此外，應用程式範圍的屬性和命令列參數僅能以程式設計的方式。Additionally, application-scope properties and command-line parameters can only be used programmatically. 以程式設計方式初始化可執行的處理事件，包括下列：Programmatic initialization can be performed by handling the event, including the following: - 取得並處理命令列參數，都是從屬性類別傳遞給事件處理常式。Acquire and process command-line parameters, which are available from the property of the class that is passed to the event handler. - 初始化應用程式範圍的資源使用屬性。Initialize application-scope resources by using the property. - 初始化應用程式範圍的屬性是使用屬性。Initialize application-scope properties by using the property. - 具現化，並會顯示一個 （或以上） 的視窗。Instantiate and show one (or more) windows. > [!NOTE] > 命令列參數也可以取得藉由呼叫靜態方法物件。Command-line parameters can also be acquired by calling the static method of the object. 不過，需要完全信任才能執行。However, requires full trust to execute. 如果您設定使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]，就無法使用從主要視窗建立屬性或屬性之後的物件直到處理事件。If you set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], the main window that is created is not available from either the property or the property of the object until after the event is processed. 如果您在啟動期間需要存取主要視窗中，您需要以手動方式建立新的視窗物件，從您事件處理常式。If you need access to the main window during startup, you need to manually create a new window object from your event handler. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的應用程式使用若要指定認證原則，您需要設定之後引發，否則[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]將其設為預設內部原則直接之後在引發事件。If your application uses to specify a credential policy, you need to set after is raised; otherwise, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] sets it to a default internal policy directly after the event has been raised. 傳遞至命令列引數事件處理常式不是相同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]查詢字串參數傳遞給[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]。The command-line arguments that are passed to the event handler are not the same as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] query string parameters that are passed to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得並處理從獨立應用程式的命令列選項。The following example shows how to acquire and process command-line options from a standalone application. 如果 **/StartMinimized**提供命令列參數，在應用程式開啟主視窗中最小化狀態。If the **/StartMinimized** command-line parameter was provided, the application opens the main window in a minimized state. [!code-xaml[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlestartupxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 無法擷取和處理命令列引數，因為它們會以啟動[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)]部署 (請參閱[部署 WPF 應用程式 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf.md))。 cannot retrieve and process command-line arguments because they are launched with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)] deployment (see [Deploying a WPF Application (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf.md)). 不過，它們可以透過用來啟動的 URL 擷取及處理查詢字串參數。However, they can retrieve and process query string parameters from the URLs that are used to launch them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用應用程式啟動時，會自動載入 UI 的資源。You can use to automatically load a UI resource when an application starts. 下表顯示 UI 資源，可載入的類型，都會開啟的視窗類型，可以將設定為這些資源的應用程式的類型。The following table shows the types of UI resources that can be loaded, the type of window they are opened into, and the type of application that these resources can be set as the . |類型Type|視窗Window|應用程式類型Application type| |----------|------------|----------------------| |||僅限獨立Standalone only| |||僅限獨立Standalone only| |||獨立/瀏覽器裝載Standalone/browser-hosted| |||獨立/瀏覽器裝載Standalone/browser-hosted| |||獨立/瀏覽器裝載Standalone/browser-hosted| |||獨立/瀏覽器裝載Standalone/browser-hosted| 通常您設定屬性以宣告方式在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。Typically, you set the property declaratively in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 不過，您可以設定程式設計角度而言，這類在事件處理常式，可用於如果只在執行階段載入必要的 UI 資源的應用程式。However, you can set programmatically, such as from a event handler, which is useful if for applications that can only load the necessary UI resources at run time. 例如，應用程式可能會等候直到在載入其資源，如果 UI 資源的名稱儲存在組態檔中的執行階段。For example, an application might wait until run time to load its resources if the name of the UI resource is stored in a configuration file. 您是否設定之前未載入以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式，對應的 UI 資源之後處理事件。Whether you set declaratively or programmatically, the corresponding UI resource is not loaded until after the event is handled. 因此，您不需要存取結果視窗中從屬性或屬性時處理。Consequently, you won't have access to the resulting window from either the property or the property when handling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會先尋找在指定的資源的應用程式範圍資源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 應用程式範圍的資源由管理，而且會公開從屬性。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果應用程式範圍資源集中找不到指定的資源然後搜尋系統資源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系統資源是由使用者定義的 shell 資源，並且包含色彩、 字型及殼層組態。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 這些由公開， ，和類型，分別靜態屬性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 若要使用取得它們，這些型別也會公開資源的索引鍵屬性是設計成傳遞給; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 因為傳回的物件，如果找到資源，您必須轉換成適當的類型傳回的值。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. 這個方法是安全執行緒，可以從任何執行緒呼叫。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取得資源。The following example shows how to use to acquire a resource. summary.span: 取得應用程式中已具現化的視窗。

span.span: Gets the instantiated windows in an application.

value.span: ，包含目前 中所有視窗物件的參考。

span.span: A that contains references to all window objects in the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A參考會自動加入至上具現化一個視窗時，立即[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]執行緒，則為所建立的背景工作執行緒不會加入 windows。A reference is automatically added to as soon as a window is instantiated on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread; windows that are created by worker threads are not added. A之後，會自動移除參考其已處理事件，以及之前其就會引發事件。A reference is automatically removed after its event has been handled and before its event is raised. 根據預設，第一個項目加入至屬性變成。By default, the first item added to the property becomes the . 這個屬性就只能從建立的執行緒物件。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何列舉屬性建置最上層的 Windows 功能表上，而這通用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)]應用程式要[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]，或是想要的多個執行個體的單一文件介面 (SDI) 應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)].The following example demonstrates how to enumerate the property to build a top-level Windows menu, which is common to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)], or multiple-instance Single Document Interface (SDI) applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)].
